title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Lane closures in both directions. Construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m. Next update time Mon Jan 20, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 9:22 PM PST. (DBC-70685)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Sun Dec 15 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 10:06 AM PST. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Bridge closed. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily + Saturdays. Alternate route via Hwy 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm) Single lane alternating traffic from 8PM-6AM PST, expect 20 minute delays. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 3:03 PM PST. (DBC-70490)

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)
Location: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich)
Description: Construction work with nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale, and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed.

title: Highway 37 Both Directions
description: Highway 37, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Deltaic Cr Bridge and Stikine Health Ctr for 268.0 km (26 km south of Bell II to Dease Lake). Because of rain on compact snow. Travellers are advised to use caution, and should consider alternate plans. Next update time Tue Dec 3 at 4:00 PM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 3 at 12:18 PM PST. (DBC-70765)
Location: Highway 37, in both directions between Deltaic Cr Bridge and Stikine Health Ctr for 268.0 km (26 km south of Bell II to Dease Lake)
Description: Because of rain on compact snow. Travellers are advised to use caution, and should consider alternate plans.

title: Highway 37A Both Directions
description: Highway 37A, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Pearly Gates and Surprise Pullout/Windy Chain Up for 33.9 km (12 km east of Stewart to 13 km west of Meziadin). Until Wed Dec 4 at 8:00 AM PST. Highway is currently open, may close for Avalanche Control or High Avalanche Hazard. If closed, hwy may remain closed for extended period of time. Next update time Wed Dec 4 at 8:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 3 at 5:50 AM PST. (DBC-70703)

title: Highway 6 NS Both Directions
description: Highway 6 NS, in both directions. Road cleared between Wilson Lake Rd and Allshouse Rd (5 km south of Nakusp). Last updated Tue Dec 3 at 4:07 PM PST. (DBC-70780)
Location: Highway 6 NS, in both directions between Wilson Lake Rd and Allshouse Rd (5 km south of Nakusp)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM & 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM & 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Wed Dec 4 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 2 at 8:08 AM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: Nisga'a Hwy Both Directions
description: Nisga'a Hwy (Highway 113), in both directions. Flooding between Broad St and Spruce Dr for 28.4 km (Gingolx to Laxgalts'ap). Road closed. Next update time Tue Dec 3 at 5:30 PM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 3 at 3:25 PM PST. (DBC-70757)
Location: Nisga'a Hwy (Highway 113), in both directions between Broad St and Spruce Dr for 28.4 km (Gingolx to Laxgalts'ap)

title: Other Roads

Location: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection
Description: Landslide, road closed. Temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road.

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
Location: Johnston Bridge at Front St. in Quesnel
Description: Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision.

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions. There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay. Starting Sat Dec 7 at 10:00 PM PST until Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Ferry will be out of service. Last sailing from Shelter Bay will be 9pm. Last sailing from Galena Bay will be 9:30pm. Next update time Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 11:18 AM PST. (DBC-70516)
Location: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions
Description: There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay.
